review_title: Has a long way to go
job_title: Surgical Services RN in Altoona, PA
pros: Better pay than most other health care facilities
cons:
-Very weak on policies, procedures and best practices.
-Almost non existent leadership development
-HR culture that is at least 20 years behind industry leaders. Performs engagement surveys and either doesn't report the results or if it does won't act on obvious shortcomings in employee engagement and poor mid level management.
-Vague priorities on service lines. Not focused on what the community needs, but niche services provided by large tertiary centers 1-2 hours a way who have a full program.
-Strangled by a legacy "good ole boy" leadership culture and a dysfunctional and oppositional labor union

review_title: Pay is Great, everything else is terrible
job_title: Nursing Assistant in State College, PA
pros: Most jobs there have great salaries
cons:
1. Mentally Abusive work environment that will have you walking on eggshells
2. Unjust working conditions, no water, no time for bathroom breaks, not even allowed to have a sweater on the back of your chair (assuming you are allowed to sit in the first place). 
3. Overloading employees with impossible amount of tasks and unattainable standards
4.  A union that does next to nothing for you
5. Full time hours even if you are part time and unwillingness  to work with your schedule (For example: wanting to be a part time employee like it states in your job description in order to obtain higher education.)

job_title: Anonymous Employee in State College, PA
pros: Some good doctors and nurses.  Still enough people in the organization that care to turn this company around.  A newer building contracted in 1971 with good growth.  Located next to Penn State University, a good partner for medical research.
cons: No Leadership from the Executive Team.  No one follows policy, it's like anarchy.  It's all about hitting your goals to receive you bonus and no longer about patient care. Poor or no planning.  Poor or no communication.  Current CEO has eliminated good people and replaced them with people who only are concerned about their personal gain.  Computer system has crashed 3 times under the current CIO.  Never was there an issue with the previous CIO.

job_title: Anonymous Employee in State College, PA
pros: Medical Benefits pay rate and retirement
cons: Caustic work environment staff works in fear of losing job, stifling energy and resourcefulness. Non-trustful administration negatively impact growth, collaboration and innovation. The people who embrace this get promoted and the smartest most capable disappear without warning or communication to remaining staff. If you're a yes person - work here! If you embrace your work and are fully devoted to providing the best possible access to care, want to feel appreciated and acknowledged - look elsewhere.

job_title: Director in State College, PA
pros: The people!  The facilities are fantastic!  The compensation is good and getting better.  The new leadership really has the patient in mind and is working diligently to find continued improvement.
cons: I would like to see the system become more aligned and consistent throughout the different entities.  Good news is that this is beginning to happen with great progress already.

job_title: Certified Coding Specialist in Tyrone, PA
pros: wonderful place in a beautiful location. Stable income from a reputable employer. Clean, friendly workspace. Competitive salaries, higher than competitors. Spence of pride working for this company. Very low turnover.
cons: The only downside for me is the travel time. State college is a very expensive place to live so living outside the city causes me to have a 45 minute commute. (Still not bad).

job_title: Security Officer in State College, PA
pros: Good pay for what the work was. They provide the equipment and pay for you to take the ACT 120 course.
cons: It is hard to get into unless you are someones family member. Avancement did not exist. Benefits were only for full time employees, most were regular part time or wage payroll.
